Class DatedConversionRateSelector

public inherited sharing class DatedConversionRateSelector

Description: Runs queries on the DatedConversionRate__c object References:

Changes

03/02/2024 Initial version. 03/05/2024 getRates(): returns the conversion rates for the given currencies before the given date. 03/09/2024 getRatesForUpdate(): method now takes only one given start date.
